DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine which of two delivery methods of Parathyroid Hormone (PTH) is preferred by patients after 14 days of use for each.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Determine the Patient Preference Between Zosano Pharma Parathyroid Hormone (ZP-PTH) Patch and Forteo Pen
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to determine which of two delivery methods of PTH is preferred by patients after 14 days of use for each. Patient preference will be determined by means of patient questionnaires at the end of each treatment period and a final questionnaire after both treatment periods are complete. Adverse events will also be collected.
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal with prior diagnosis of osteoporosis Significant health issue previous use of teriparatide History of Paget's disease
